title: Field Remedy: 2130
subject:
Manual transmission - Clutch does not
disengage and/or gears hard to engage
complaint:
Clutch does not disengage and /or gears hard
to engage.
cause:
Toothing of the input shaft not greased
(either forgotten in procution or after clutch replacement in
service).

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint check first the greasing of the input shaft. 
If necessary thinly grease gear teeth of input shaft with grease 
(partnumber: 90397024 / cataloguenumber: 19 48 568). Please do 
not change any other parts.
